tp:treatment-sec.p:
MADAGASCAR –
Antsiranana
• 3 juvs ; Marojejy ; 14°26′ S , 49°45′ E ; alt.
700 m
;
10–17 Nov. 1993
; NHMD
.

Three more specimens have been collected from the type locality.
Zoosphaerium smaragdinum
is currently classified as Near Threatened ( Rudolf & Wesener 2017c ) on the IUCN Red List.
